Plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
Title: Spirited Away
Actors: Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takashi Naitô
tomatoConsensus: Spirited Away is a dazzling, enchanting, and gorgeously drawn fairy tale that will leave viewers a little more curious and fascinated by the world around them.
